pageSetting.title: 行员等级评定查询

attribute.value: select djpdmc as key,djpdmc as value from djpd_djbz where f_numtochar(pdnf) = substr(f_numtochar($pdrq$),1,4) and khdx='2'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khdx_hy.khdxdh, djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq pdrq, khdx_jg.jgdh, khdx_jg.jgmc, khdx_hy.hydh, khdx_hy.hymc, dmms.dmms khzq, djpd_yyjg_hy.pm, djpd_yyjg_hy.jbmc dj, djpd_yyjg_hy.dj djpx, djpd_yyjg_hy.jlbz, djpd_yyjg_hy.ms from djpd_yyjg_hy djpd_yyjg_hy inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh = khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join csb_dmms dmms on upper(dmms.dmmc) = 'DJPDZQ' and dmms.dmz = djpd_yyjg_hy.pdzq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($pdrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = khdx_hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq= $pdrq$ and khdx_hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and djpd_yyjg_hy.djpdmc = '$djpdmc$'

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select khdx_hy.khdxdh, djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq pdrq, khdx_jg.jgdh, khdx_jg.jgmc, khdx_hy.hydh, khdx_hy.hymc, dmms.dmms khzq, djpd_yyjg_hy.pm, djpd_yyjg_hy.jbmc dj, djpd_yyjg_hy.dj djpx, djpd_yyjg_hy.jlbz, djpd_yyjg_hy.ms from djpd_yyjg_hy djpd_yyjg_hy inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh = khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join csb_dmms dmms on upper(dmms.dmmc) = 'DJPDZQ' and dmms.dmz = djpd_yyjg_hy.pdzq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($pdrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = khdx_hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq= $pdrq$ and khdx_hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and djpd_yyjg_hy.djpdmc = '$djpdmc$' ) t
